content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day December 21, 2017 Facebook Users Hit With Coinminer Malware December 21, 2017 The value of Bitcoin virtual currency just hit a new all-time high, and with it an increasing number of malware threats are targeting users to borrow their PCs CPU for use in mining the precious cryptocurrency, something we last wrote about in October here.
